txt.en:
'If we are to put an end to Dol Guldur once and for all, we must first deal with their scouts and hunters: the Wargs of Draugdegil. For too long, our scouts have been harried in the wild by these fell beasts. Their eyes are everywhere, their ears keen, and their fangs sharp.

'Travel north to the gate at Fennas Guldur and enter into Draugdegil.  There you will find the breeding-ground for the beasts where the Warg-matron Kranklob rests, tending her foul brood in the service of the Dark Lord.

'Defeat them and return to me.'
'You have done well, [placeholder]!  Already scouts have reported back without seeing hide nor hair of a Warg. Hopefully, we are rid of the beasts once and for all!'
The Wargs of Draugdegil are among the most powerful that Haukur has ever seen.
Haukur is at Helethir, south from the gate at Fennas Guldur.\n\nYou should return to Haukur for your reward.
